title: Inquiry Learning Design Linked to Science Museums

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific concepts (physics/chemistry/biology) and foundational museum-based learning competencies
context.additional_context: Establishment of a collaborative system with local science museums, enabling the use of digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Students can write logical reports explaining scientific concepts by analyzing museum exhibits.
Students can generate scientific inquiry questions through exhibit observations and engage in peer evaluation and feedback.
Students can systematically document museum learning experiences and visualize conceptual relationships using digital tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
